page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content:
The Tuesday club meets at the Rectory about once a month.Each month they meet, some_body comes and talks to the people who are in the club, like a doctor, vet, etc. The Rector's wife started the Tuesday Club because there was not enough amusement for young wives. This gives them an opportunity to meet with other people.
The Parish Lunch is held about once a year in the village hall .The date is often around Christmas. The rector and his wife, who are my parents, run the lunch. They have a hot lunch or buffet. Last year we had a buffet dinner at night instead. The choir from Church sang Christmas Carols. People share the preparation in their own houses. The Rev.Thomas usually taking on the task of cooking the meat.
